title: Herbal Snacking Mix (Mild Spices)
excerpt: A roasted nut and seed mix seasoned with gentle digestive spices to support balanced snacking.
content:
## What Is This Herbal Snacking Mix?
A nutrient-rich blend of roasted nuts and seeds flavored with mild Ayurvedic digestive spices. Designed for balanced energy without heaviness.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Spices like cumin and black pepper aid digestion and prevent post-snack sluggishness. Nuts offer grounding for Vata, energy for Pitta, but should be portion-controlled for Kapha.

### Key Benefits
- Healthy on-the-go snack.
- Supports digestion with mild spices.
- Nourishes with natural fats and minerals.

## Ingredients
- Roasted almonds
- Pumpkin seeds
- Sesame seeds
- Mild spices: cumin, black pepper

## Usage Instructions
- Enjoy one small handful per snack. Avoid overeating, especially for Kapha dosha types.

## Packaging
- Snack pouch with dosha-based serving suggestions.

## Safety & Consultation
- Contains nuts. Consult for allergies or digestive disorders.

## Why Choose This Mix?
A delicious, dosha-informed snack crafted for mindful, healthy eating.
